desc: Freepost sharpening service for dog groomers, hairdressers, chefs, and a range of industries. We sharpen scissors, clipper blades, knives with a 24-48 hour turnaround. We stock dog shampoo, scissors and replacement blades, brushes, and all your grooming supplies from the most popular pet grooming brands.

layout.text: UK dog grooming supplies and blade sharpening, all in one place.
